scripts.start-webpack: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && webpack ./src/index.js --output-filename puter.js && webpack ./src/index.js --output-filename puter.dev.js --watch --devtool source-map
scripts.build:
export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && webpack ./src/index.js --output-filename puter.js && { echo "// Copyright 2024 Puter Technologies Inc. All rights reserved."; echo "// Generated on $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')
"; cat ./dist/puter.js; } > temp && mv temp ./dist/puter.js
